Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 to us due to its unique features, superior materials, and the expertise that went into its creation. We believe it could be an invaluable addition to your collection or operations. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at this exclusive price. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will have the opportunity to experience firsthand the excellence that comes with owning this product. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
